name: Sun Madness
description:
This game will be update in the futur, we await your criticism & comment :) Croco'devs team

Take a journey between calm night and rough days  . the sun have made some huge damages on the peoples of this Town, your only chance is to fight against the hordes of monster and use the teleporter to go back in the service station

For how long you will be able to hold against this horde or worst , your how mind !

Move: WASD
Interactions: E
Jump : Space
Primary shoot : mouse left
Secondary shoot : mouse right
switch : mouse wheel

Game made during the 6th week of the ECDC's gamejam , with the theme "Sanity !"
By Hugo Saal & Mève Audigier
a big shout out to Louis Dumur and Guillaume Benoit  !
